chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
empty: A
============================
forall (a : A) (b : pbtree A), inpb (pbleaf a) b -> inb (leaf a) (to_btree b)

Related definitions and lemmas:
pbleaf : forall A : Type, A -> pbtree A
leaf : forall A : Type, A -> btree A
to_btree = fix to_btree (a : pbtree A) : btree A := match a with | pbleaf b => leaf b | pbleft l1 | pbright l1 => to_btree l1 | pbnode l1 l2 => node (to_btree l1) (to_btree l2) end : pbtree A -> btree A
inpb : forall A : Type, pbtree A -> pbtree A -> Prop
inb : forall A : Type, btree A -> btree A -> Prop
Inductive pbtree (A : Type) : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree A | pbleft : pbtree A -> pbtree A | pbright : pbtree A -> pbtree A | pbnode : pbtree A -> pbtree A -> pbtree A Arguments pbtree _%type_scope Arguments pbleaf [A]%type_scope Arguments pbleft [A]%type_scope Arguments pbright [A]%type_scope Arguments pbnode [A]%type_scope
pbtree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : pbtree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
inpb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : pbtree A, {inpb a b} + {~ inpb a b}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (n : nat) (m : list A), In (a, n) (frequency_list eqA_dec m) -> In a m
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
add_frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat)
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}
correct_encoding : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A), unique_prefix c -> not_null c -> forall m : list A, in_alphabet m c -> decode c (encode eqA_dec c m) = m
frequency_length : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), unique_key c -> length (encode eqA_dec c m) = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : A * list bool) => a + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec (fst b) m * length (snd b)) c 0
weight_tree_compute : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
all_pbleaves_inpb : forall (A : Type) (t : pbtree A) (a : A), In a (all_pbleaves t) -> inpb (pbleaf a) t
all_pbleaves_in : forall (A : Type) (t : pbtree A) (a : A), inpb (pbleaf a) t -> In a (all_pbleaves t)
all_leaves_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), In a (all_leaves t) -> inb (leaf a) t
all_leaves_in : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), inb (leaf a) t -> In a (all_leaves t)
find_code_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : code A) (l2 : list (A * list bool)), not_null l1 -> find_code eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = match find_code eqA_dec a l1 with | nil => find_code eqA_dec a l2 | b1 :: l3 => b1 :: l3 end
in_alphabet_compute_code : forall (A : Type) (m : list A) (t : btree A), (forall a : A, In a m -> inb (leaf a) t) -> in_alphabet m (compute_code t)
pbleaf_or_not : forall (A : Type) (p : pbtree A), (exists a : A, p = pbleaf a) \/ (forall a : A, p <> pbleaf a)
in_pbcompute_inpb : forall (A : Type) (t : pbtree A) (a : A) (l : list bool), In (a, l) (compute_pbcode t) -> inpb (pbleaf a) t
inCompute_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A) (l : list bool), In (a, l) (compute_code t) -> inb (leaf a) t
inpb_compute_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (p : pbtree A), inpb (pbleaf a) p -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) (compute_pbcode p)
inb_compute_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (p : btree A), inb (leaf a) p -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) (compute_code p)
